note.p: Birth: Christ's Hospital, London, England (19 March 1799)
Death: Haddenham, near Thame, Oxfordshire (15 February 1868)
Education: Charterhouse, Surrey; St Bartholomew's Hospital

Career: Entered medical practice, Haddenham, Buckinghamshire, then in Liverpool; became an Independent minister; left the ministry; in charge of the observatory of George Bishop (FRS 1848), South Villa, Regent's Park (1839-1844); set up his own observatory at Camden Lodge, Kent; died of apoplexy
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; DSB; Charterhouse Miscellany
